metadata.title: Latitude/Longitude Lines Every 2 Degrees

creators.name: USDA Forest Service, Alaska Department of Natural Resources, Division of Support Services-Land Records Information Section

metadata.description: Data Type: Base Maps  ;This file contains latitude and longitude lines for every two degrees spanning the state. The annotation subclass anno2mil can be used to draw labels for the even degrees around the border of statewide maps. Other annotation subclasses have been added in order to place latitude- longitude annotation around the borders of 1:1,000,000 scale maps: anno_sw (southwest region), anno_sc (southcentral region), anno_se (southeast region), anno_n (northern region), anno_ap (Alaskan Peninsula region), and anno_al (Aleutian Islands region).
metadata.notes:

Use constraints: DNR does not recommend use of this data at a larger scale. Greater detail for each layer is provided from DNR, Land Records Information Section, for each data module upon receipt of order.
